name: Stormcloak Officer (Whiterun)
role: Officer leading the Stormcloak infiltration force inside Dragonsreach

aspects.high_concept: Stormcloak Strike Leader Inside the Lion's Den
aspects.trouble: The Plan Didn't Account for This Much Resistance

stunts: Infiltrator's Edge: +2 to Fight in the first exchange of combat when the enemy is surprised or in difficult terrain.
Rally Cry: Once per scene, grant +1 to all Stormcloak allies in the zone for one exchange.

equipment.special: Postern gate key, Greymane correspondence (if captured)

combat_tactics: Fights aggressively while attempting to hold the Dragonsreach chokepoint. Will retreat across the bridge if stress is too high. Capture reveals the Greymane Contact intelligence.

capture_vs_kill.capture: Reveals 'Greymane Contact' aspect (1 free invoke) and reduces Stage 2 Imperial defense opposition by 1.
capture_vs_kill.kill: No intel; Stormcloaks gain +1 momentum in Stage 2.
capture_vs_kill.forced_retreat: Officer escapes; ticks Hadvar/Ralof rivalry clock +1.

scene_triggers: Battle of Whiterun Stage 1 (Imperial defense - Dragonsreach breach)
